post-tool-use-hook.command: if [[ "$TOOL_NAME" == "Edit" || "$TOOL_NAME" == "Write" || "$TOOL_NAME" == "MultiEdit" ]]; then echo 'ODL & WCAG 2.1 AA compliance check triggered for file: $FILE_PATH - Checking accessibility and design system compliance'; fi

accessibility-validation-hook.description: Validate WCAG 2.1 AA compliance on component changes
accessibility-validation-hook.prompt:
ACCESSIBILITY VALIDATION REQUIRED: A component file has been modified. Perform comprehensive WCAG 2.1 AA compliance validation for {file_path}:

**CRITICAL CHECKS:**
1. Color contrast ratios (4.5:1 normal text, 3:1 large text/UI)
2. Keyboard navigation support (Tab/Enter/Space)
3. ARIA attributes (aria-label, role, etc.)
4. Focus indicators (visible, 3:1+ contrast)
5. Screen reader compatibility
6. Text spacing (1.5+ line height)

**ODL THEME VALIDATION:**
7. CSS custom properties usage (var(--odl-*))
8. No hardcoded color/spacing values
9. Component interface standards

Reference ODL_COMPLIANCE_GUIDE.md and report any violations with priority classification.

file-change-hook.description: Trigger ODL compliance check on file changes
file-change-hook.prompt: A file matching ODL component patterns has been modified. Please run the ODL compliance agent to check this file: {file_path}
